description:
The app works great and does what it's supposed to do. However, you need to install either `cryfs` or `gocryptfs` on the host system which is very inconvenient and needs fixing.

There are also some design flaws (e.g. the preferences dialog isn't an AdwPreferencesWindow) but they won't really get in the way.
summary: It works well, but needs some setup on the host

description: you need to install CryFS for it to work, once installed it is easy to use.
summary: Works great need to install cryFS

description: just had to follow https://www.2daygeek.com/sirikali-password-protect-encrypt-decrypt-folder-directory-linux/ to get it going
Looks nice and works as expected, thanks!
summary: Works great and very much appreciated

description:
I am hiding a secondary Firefox profile in the vault. 
You need to install gocryptfs and/or CryFS for this version.
Easy to use and works without a hitch!
doesn't work, it asks me to install cryfs or gocryptfs. after installing cryfs nothing happend it kept doing the same thing. so I tried gocrptfs, same thing.
